ProductInfo.Features:
GW9704H: Professional 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with HDMI & VGA. 960×480 & 30FPS recording. iPhone, Android Viewing. New color graphical menu. Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW613WD: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices Camera. 700 TV lines, 3.6mm lens, 48pcs IR LED, 164 ft IR Distance. WDR(Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu. Vandal proof & water proof
GW738G: Professional 1/3" Exview HAD CCD II Camera. 700 TV lines, 3.6mm lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98.4 ft IR Distance. Vandalproof. WDR (Wide Dynamic Range). OSD Menu.
Package Includes:     GW9704H DVR with 2TB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     2 x GW613WD - 1/3" Effio-E CCD Camera;     2 x GW738G - 1/3" Effio-E CCD Camera;
1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC;     2 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC;     1 x GW12V3A: 12V3A Power Supply for Security Cameras;     1 x GW124CA: 1 to 4 Power Splitter Adapter Cables.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 4CHE1 4 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 4 x 1/3" Effio-E Camera 700 TV lines 3.6mm lens Security Camera System, Free LED (White)
